title: Macron says ‘Coalition of the Willing’ will finalise ‘robust’ Ukrainian security guarantees – Europe live
summary: Leaders gathered in Paris are set to communicate with Donald Trump this afternoon. The discussions are likely to focus on critical issues at hand. This meeting highlights ongoing international engagement and diplomacy.

title: Adelaide v Collingwood: 2025 AFL first qualifying final – live
summary: The 2025 finals series kicks off in Adelaide with a match between the top two teams in the ladder. Martin Pegan will provide real-time updates on the game. Fans can follow the goal-by-goal report for the latest developments.

title: UK construction in longest downturn since early 2020; global bond sell-off eases – business live
summary: UK construction activity has experienced its longest continuous slump in five years, reflecting a challenging economic environment. This downturn comes as long-term borrowing costs in the UK decrease. The combination suggests potential shifts in investment and development within the construction sector ahead.

title: Reeves has ‘full confidence’ in Rayner, and thinks deputy PM can keep her job – UK politics live
summary: The Chancellor has expressed strong support for a colleague involved in a stamp duty mistake. This endorsement comes despite the controversy surrounding the error. The Chancellor emphasized the importance of standing by team members during challenging times.

title: Summer’s ending – and the delusion that a new me might be possible is back | Emma Brockes
summary: Guardian columnist Emma Brockes reflects on the beginning of the new school year as a fresh opportunity for self-improvement. She expresses intentions to adopt a more disciplined lifestyle, reduce clutter, and show greater kindness to her cats. This annual renewal of resolve highlights her commitment to personal growth and organization.
